definition: to stop at this point/to end here/to call it a day
to (a place)/until (a time)/up to/to go/to arrive/(verb complement denoting completion or result of an action)
this/these
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
to stop/to prohibit/until/only

sentences.english: And so much for the future of America's increasingly desperate jobless.
sentences.chinese: 美国越来越绝望的失业者的未来也到此为止。

sentences.english: But Cheng Rushan default it was smart to let it go so far.
sentences.chinese: 可是程如山默认了曾聪明的做法让这件事到此为止。

sentences.english: I thought that there the matter ended, but that was not to be.
sentences.chinese: 我以为这件事会到此为止，但是还为时尚早。

sentences.english: But in fact, he doesn't end there. He doesn't make so clear a declaration.
sentences.chinese: 但事实上他没有到此为止，他并没有清楚的声明。

sentences.english: Yet restoration plans don't stop there.
sentences.chinese: 然而，恢复计划没有到此为止。

sentences.english: But these acquisitions can only go so far.
sentences.chinese: 但这些收购的影响力也只能到此为止。

sentences.english: Well, I think that's it today for my feelings on our hometown's blockhouse .
sentences.chinese: 好了，关于自己对碉楼的情愫，今天就到此为止了。

sentences.english: Reading scholarly journals will only get me so far.
sentences.chinese: 阅读学术期刊只会让我到此为止。

sentences.english: So far, the optimum model of stowage has been established.
sentences.chinese: 到此为止，配载方案的优化模型也建立完毕。

sentences.english: Figure 21 shows what we have done so far.
sentences.chinese: 图21展示了到此为止我们所做的工作。
游戏到此为止，人类孩子。

sentences.english: She has not veered wholly off-course—yet.
sentences.chinese: 到此为止，她还没有完完全全偏离自己的轨道。

sentences.english: But so much for the success of public health when left to its own devices.
sentences.chinese: 但是，对公共卫生方面成就的述说就到此为止吧。

sentences.english: Let's call it a day and go home.
sentences.chinese: 今天到此为止吧，大家回家吧。

sentences.english: Charity begins at home,but should not end there.
sentences.chinese: 施舍先及亲友，但不应到此为止。

definition: to stop/to halt
to come to the end of a phase (idiom)
to make a long story short (idiom)
for now/for the time being/temporarily
at this point/thus/from then on
to have nothing to say (idiom)
to be finished/to be done for/ruined/gone to the dogs/oh no
to settle/to finish/to conclude/to wind up
to drop (subject etc)
hereto/hereunto
to meet again/until we meet again/goodbye
as matters stand/things having reached this stage
see 沒關係|没关系[mei2 guan1 xi5]
to finish/to conclude/completed
easy to deal with/not a problem/(polite answer) you flatter me
to realize clearly/to settle a matter/to get it over with
